name: p142 - MDD-15
notes:
"Why the generated weapon doesn't match the example in the Field Catalogue

- The manifest in the book doesn't have the 150% cost and 50% weight increase for anti-material rifle calibre (p37). This also has the knock on effect of making the magazine cost in the table incorrect as the cost of a standard magazine is 1% of the weapon purchase price (p45)
- The manifest in the book has the base range as 500m for anti-material rifle calibre but the rules say it's 1000 (p39)
- The manifest in the book doesn't have the Quickdraw -2 modifier for the scope Accessory (p46)
- The manifest in the book doesn't show what feed it's using, the description says it's belt fed which would mean additional Quickdraw -8 and Inaccurate -1 modifiers (p45)
- The table in the book has a damage of 7D for the twin chain gun variant but I think it should be 6D. I'm assuming the increase in damage over the single chain gun variant comes from the fact multi-mounting gives the weapon the RF classification. However the rules for RF (p32) say it gives an additional 1D of damage per 3 full dice of damage. As the weapon has 5D of damage before the RF upgrade that would mean it would gain an additional 1D."
